Style/HashSyntax.description:
Description

Prefer Ruby 1.9 hash syntax { a: 1, b: 2 } over 1.8 syntax { :a => 1, :b => 2 }.
Style/HashSyntax.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: ruby19 (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['ruby19', 'hash_rockets', 'no_mixed_keys', 'ruby19_no_mixed_keys'] (type: list)
EnforcedShorthandSyntax: either (type: str)
SupportedShorthandSyntax: ['always', 'never', 'either', 'consistent', 'either_consistent'] (type: list)
UseHashRocketsWithSymbolValues: False (type: bool)
PreferHashRocketsForNonAlnumEndingSymbols: False (type: bool)
